document_data.name: ''The Devoted Servant''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Devoted Servant''''' was a magical [[katana]] crafted in [[Wa]] for the [[shogun]]'s most loyal [[samurai]].
document_data.Description: It had a golden hue and a blade wrapped with red cloth.
document_data.Powers: It was a ''+1 katana'' that inflicted additional damage of a divine nature.
document_data.History: By unknown means, one of these swords surfaced in [[Faer√ªn]] ''circa'' [[1374 DR]].
